postcss-selector-parser

Selector parser with built in methods for working with selector strings.

Install

With npm do:

npm install postcss-selector-parser

Quick Start

```js var parser = require(‘postcss-selector-parser’); var transform = function (selectors) { selectors.eachInside(function (selector) { // do something with the selector console.log(String(selector)) }); };

var transformed = parser(transform).process(‘h1, h2, h3’).result; ```

To normalize selector whitespace:

js var parser = require('postcss-selector-parser'); var normalized = parser().process('h1, h2, h3', {lossless:false}).result; // -> h1,h2,h3

API

Please see API.md.
